This game never gets old.  Highly recommended, years later tons of people are still playing this.  

It's your typical run and shoot game - Terrorists vs. Police 

I hardly play the original game mode anymore, the Gun Game mod is pretty cool.  Everytime you get a kill you get a different gun, to win you must kill someone with a grenade.  The grenade isn't very strong.

Better than Counter Strike Global Offensive.

CS:GO is offensive to the franchise

So many hours of fun... To be honest, My friend had this game when we where kids... All we ever played with Zombie Mod, So when I saw this game on for 7.99$ I to buy it, I am proud to say that I have played more hours on this game than meets the eye.

Although not very "Good" graphics its sure to give you at least a laugh... I recommend this game..


PS: The more the better when it comes to Counter Strike Source.
Fun game for when your bored and have nothing else to play...Great Game!
Excellent game!  Got $20 in your pocket and wanna buy a game with it?  Get this!  200/10

so fun to play and good if you want a competitve experience,

suitable for any pc gamer, some fun servers etc..

ОЧЕНЬ КРУТАЯ ИГРА НЕ ЛАГОВ НЕ ГЛЮГОВ НЕ БАГОВ ОДНО ТОКО ВОСХОЖДЕНИЯ

(one of) Best game ever - of course an excellent re-make of just a brilliant , immersive team game. flawless in every way (hey Gabe i think the punters would agree) um, how can i say this "sv_acceleration @ 5 makes it too unrealistic" I would suggest 4.4 4.5 accell - for realism - afterall thats why people play i presume, apart from that. Brilliant and God-like! Love this game

P.s - "To be able to adjust _sidespeed _backspeed _forwardspeed under the allocated limit of 400 Should NEVER, EVER, EVER, EVER be considered as a "Cheat" because all-in-all people do run at different speeds holding a weapon" Try it, you may like it
I don't care for this game I just wanted it for Garry's Mod textures to work.
The reason I love CS:S is because of how many Custom Gamemodes/Maps there are. You could basically spend you entire life exploring.

그냥 최고의 작품이다.소스 엔진의 명가를 보여주는 작품또한 플레이어들에게 맵 제작 및 스킨 제작을 허용함으로써 자유로움이 생겼다.과거에 비해 많은 버그 또는 핵이 사라져서 좋아졌다.아쉽거나 단점 같은거는 없다.

Легендарная игра. Со временем становится только лучше. Если бы разроботчики ещё немного поработали над физикой в игре, то я бы в неё играл без останговки. А так всё круто. Советую.
